Amazon is taking $150 off the price of a new M4 iMac, with a special, limited-time coupon deal for Black Friday.

Don't spend too long picking which color you want — Amazon's Black Friday discount on the M4 iMac cannot last long. Currently three iMac colors are available (blue, green and silver), and the base model is just $1,149.99 if you clip the on-page coupon.

The iMac has always been a hit, but now it has Apple's powerful new M4 processor. The discounted price gets you that plus 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD storage — and a 24-inch Retina Display.

It's Apple's best-value desktop Mac. It's a simple all-in-one purchase that includes a superb monitor, yet this configuration is great for any user from ones with occasional need for a Mac, to ones who require the best performance to get their work done.
